price: Basi akayavunja vipande vipande, ila kubwa lao, ili wao walirudie.
arabic: فَجَعَلَهُمۡ جُذَٰذًا إِلَّا كَبِيرٗا لَّهُمۡ لَعَلَّهُمۡ إِلَيۡهِ يَرۡجِعُونَ
footnotes: Baada ya kwisha ondoka wale watu, Ibrahim aliwaendea masanamu akayavunja vipande vipande, isipokuwa sanamu kumbwa, hilo aliliacha ili wapate kuliregea waliulize yalio wasibu miungu yao nalo halikujibu kitu, kwa hivyo upotovu wa ibada yao ikabainika.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: fajaʿalahum judhādhan illā kabīran lahum laʿallahum ilayhi yarjiʿūna
